question: Which is the only corporatized major port of India?
explanation:
Kamarajar Port located in Ennore, on the Coromandel Coast is the only corporatized major port of India. It is also the first port in India which is a public company.
The Port was seen in news recently, as it has handled the largest ever container vessel - MSC Faith. As per the company, the new generation terminal is equipped with latest gantry cranes and sufficient backup yard.
